member.name: T:Microsoft.Dynamics.Retail.PaymentSDK.Portable.Constants.CommerceIdentificationProperties
member.summary: Set of properties related to Commerce Identification data.
member.remarks: The number of EnvironmentIDx properties can be used to build a composite key to uniquely describe an environment. The recommendation is to leverage EnvironmentId1 to outline the most common identifier and then use 2, 3, 4 as nested subidentifiers to build several layers of identification if needed.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Dynamics.Retail.PaymentSDK.Portable.Constants.CommerceIdentificationProperties.CustomerId
member.summary: Gets the property name corresponding to the unique Customer ID used to start payment session in IPaymentProcessor.GetPaymentAcceptPoint() call.
member.remarks: The value for this property is built by a connector implementation based on other properties from this namespace supplied into the IPaymentProcessor.RetrievePaymentAcceptResult().

member.summary: Gets the PaymentAcceptUrl property. The property contains the URL to open the payment accepting page.

member.summary: Gets the PaymentAcceptSubmitUrl property. The property contains the URL to submit the payment accepting page.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Dynamics.Retail.PaymentSDK.Portable.Constants.TransactionDataProperties.PaymentAcceptMessageOrigin
member.summary: Gets the PaymentAcceptMessageOrigin property. The value could be the origin of the PaymentAcceptUrl property, or the origin of a different page URL.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Dynamics.Retail.PaymentSDK.Portable.Constants.TransactionDataProperties.ReturnUrl
member.remarks: The property is a way to deliver into the payment connector the setting ReturnUrl which can be supplied in RS call RetrieveCardPaymentAcceptResult. Payment connectors might use this property for scenarios involving a redirect flow which require the Url to redirect the user back.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Dynamics.Retail.PaymentSDK.Portable.Constants.TransactionDataProperties.TokenizedPaymentSession
member.summary: Gets an optional tokenized payment session.
member.remarks: It must not contain any secrets, personal identifiable or privacy related data. The encrypted content stored in this property should not be possible to decrypt by Retail Server, only Payment Gateway associated with the payment connector should be able to do that. This property could be stored on Cart object in Channel database while CardPaymentService is processing RetrievePaymentAcceptResult call.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Dynamics.Retail.PaymentSDK.Portable.Constants.TransactionDataProperties.PaymentTrackingId
